body:
Comment 1: 
The package is patterned off of jsontemplate, which uses only { },
not off of Django.

Note that you can define your own template parser and change
the delimiters to whatever strings you like.  For example, see
http://code.google.com/p/boolean-oracle/source/browse/app/web/web.go#127
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
